quoteText:
after having responded to your inquiry you do not pursue business with us we destroy the personal data we collected after 30 days

Technical Data

Our web server collects your IP, the time you visited, the page you've seen. We do not use this technical data we collect about your connection to our site other than in case of breach attempts on our sites. The technical data is destroyed after 30 days
title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
